message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this incredible product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $20000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $17500 to make this work. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $16000?
